description: A set of date ranges for materials checkout and their associated due dates.

items.description: A date range and associated due date, connected with the parent FixedDueDateSchedule.

from.description: The start of a date range during which materials checked out will be assigned the due date in the 'due' field. Conforms to the ISO 8601 date and time format.

to.description: The end of a date range during which materials checked out will be assigned the due date in the 'due' field. Conforms to the ISO 8601 date and time format.

due.description: The due date for materials checked out in the date range between the 'from' and 'to' dates. Conforms to the ISO 8601 date and time format.

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
